alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 27 at 8:57PM MST until December 28 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...The Winter Weather Advisory has been cancelled, but wind gusts as high as 35 mph are expected to produce some blowing and drifting snow. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills dropping to near 30 below zero below 7000 feet. * WHERE...Arco Desert and the Beaverhead Lemhi Highlands, including the cities of Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon, Dubois, Spencer, Edie School, and Small. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility and create road closures. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands
